com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.listener

Interface WindowListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WindowAdapter

    public interface WindowListener
    This listener class is for listening to events happening to a Window. If you want to listen to window events but don't care about all the different event types, you can extend the WindowAdapter class instead.
    Author:
    Martin
    See Also:
    Window, WindowAdapter

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onFocusChanged(Window window, Interactable fromComponent, Interactable toComponent)
      Called by the window whenever the input focus has changed from one component to another
      void onUnhandledKeyboardInteraction(Window window, Key key)
      Called by the window when there was a keyboard input event that no component could handle
      void onWindowClosed(Window window)
      Called by the window when it has been closed and removed from the GUIScreen.
      void onWindowInvalidated(Window window)
      Called when a window has been internally modified and needs to be repainted by the GUI system.
      void onWindowShown(Window window)
      Called by the window when it has been added and showed up on a GUIScreen.

    • Method Detail

      • onWindowInvalidated

        void onWindowInvalidated(Window window)
        Called when a window has been internally modified and needs to be repainted by the GUI system.
        Parameters:
        window - Window that was invalidated

      • onWindowShown

        void onWindowShown(Window window)
        Called by the window when it has been added and showed up on a GUIScreen.
        Parameters:
        window - Window that has been displayed

      • onWindowClosed

        void onWindowClosed(Window window)
        Called by the window when it has been closed and removed from the GUIScreen.
        Parameters:
        window - Window that was closed and removed

      • onUnhandledKeyboardInteraction

        void onUnhandledKeyboardInteraction(Window window,
                                  Key key)
        Called by the window when there was a keyboard input event that no component could handle
        Parameters:
        window - Window that recieved the input event
        key - Key that couldn't be handled

      • onFocusChanged

        void onFocusChanged(Window window,
                  Interactable fromComponent,
                  Interactable toComponent)
        Called by the window whenever the input focus has changed from one component to another
        Parameters:
        window - Window that switched input focus
        fromComponent - Component that lost focus, or null if no component was previously focused
        toComponent - Component that received focus, or null if no component has focus
